title: Wendy’s Just Dropped the Hottest Mix Tape of 2018 - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 03.23.18
description:
Thanks to Me Undies for sponsoring this episode. Go to http://MeUndies.com/Morning

-NYC firefighter dies battling blaze on set of Bruce Willis, Edward Norton film 'motherless Brooklyn' (7:43 mins)
-The Spice Girls' next project: an animated superhero movie (10:08 mins)
-Is Wendys about to drop the hottest mixtape of all time? & Mixtape dropped (13:40 mins)
-Steven Spielberg Doesn’t Think Netflix Movies Should Qualify for Oscars (19:00 mins)
-Moviepass drops monthly price to under $7 for limited time (27:45 mins)

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Tim surprises Nick with the Hottest Mix Tape of 2018, Movie Pass is too cheap to pass up, and should Netflix movies get Emmys instead of Oscars?

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.
